experience: You and Steven both know Eric Keosky-Smith, Fred von Graf, PMP, and 28 others

Grown from an independent contractor selling my services to clients, to now a successful business owner of a unique Software as a Service (SaaS) platform. Avagate empowers other talented developers and engineers to find the happiness in their workplace again. I am actively involved in events across the Phoenix valley, and always seeking talented individuals and captivating ideas by entrepreneurial spirited individuals. My free time is spent with my wonderful wife and daughter in Arizona. My personal 2020 goal is to completely disrupt the Employer->Slave mentality.

Developed and incorporated project workflows for developers and clients to encourage active communication between product owners, developers, and project leaders.  Maintained active and open discussions with clients to develop project scopes and deliverables. Consistently scheduled and met estimated project deadlines with available team resources. Innovated proven foundation in project scopes that led to healthy project life-cycles. Provided written and verbal clarification between developers and project requirements to meet and excel product owner expectations.

Web Developer for multiple AAA clubs. AAA Arizona, AAA Oklahoma, AAA South Dakota, AAA Northwest Ohio, AAA MountainWest (Alaska, Montana, Wyoming) and AAA Hoosier (Indiana). Considered as the technical lead for many AAA.com applications and third-party integrations.

Was sole webmaster for AAA MountainWest (AK, MT, WY) website, working remotely from AAA Arizona Headquarters (Phoenix). Integrated and managed all email marketing efforts for five AAA clubs via Acxiom Digital Impact. Implemented Omniture Analytics across multiple club websites. Assisted in launching real-time transactional membership system for two AAA clubs.

Developed online forms, databases and applications to heighten the awareness and use of AAA.com. Heightened conversion rates by researching consumers’ primary focus and goals. Created and executed new cost-effective marketing ideas to reach target markets. Created and sent all e-mail marketing efforts (in-house). Created and reported month end online revenue reports. Maintained website with up-to-date information. Stayed PCI compliant with information collected and/or stored online. Maintained in-house web server with updates and backups. Scanned and resolved security threats throughout site consistently. Communicated with customers, management, internal departments, and vendors to coordinate overall marketing effort in accordance with corporate goals.
Attended part-time while working for AAA Northwest Ohio and then was asked to leave school to work full-time with AAA Arizona.
Attended part-time while working for AAA Northwest Ohio and then was asked to leave school to work full-time with AAA Arizona.

A head coach for CCV STARS soccer at the East Valley Campus (Mesa, AZ). I look forward to the fun, the challenges and the smiles a child has on the field. There is nothing I want more than to see more kids and more coaches on the field.

I have had the pleasure of knowing Steve for over 4 years now, spanning 3 of his jobs listed here on LinkedIn.  Simply put, you cannot lock Steve down into a title or even category of job.  He is an outstanding developer capable of solving very complex problems in a fast and efficient manner that will leave you amazed. But he is much more than that. Steve can easily change perspectives and look at a problem through the eyes of the consumer - no easy feat in today's world of hyper-specialization.  He is a tireless advocate for the customer and spends a lot of time thinking about how to meet both the needs of the business and the customer. In my career I have come across very few people that have the breadth and depth of skills that Steve does. Calculating his value is impossible. He would be the first pick for any team I was putting together.
